name: Quantum Computing Research Collaboration and Innovation Tracker

parameters.subject: New Quantum Computing Collaboration Opportunity: {{$json["title"]}}
parameters.text:
Dear Researcher,

A new research paper titled "{{$json["title"]}}" may present collaboration opportunities. The paper covers the following topics:

{{$json["topics"].join(", ")}}

Read more and consider reaching out to co-authors:
{{$json["link"]}}

Best regards,
Quantum Computing Innovation Tracker Team

options.title: Trending Topics in Quantum Computing Research
